title: Drawing, 1938-88-1979
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d)
inscribed: Upper right: Altro Capo foco ideato per L'Esma Dsa Grillo con L'esilio per la spesa/ sbolegiato per li tre/ elementi che sostega-/ no il quarto segnato/ il giorno di Domenica/ otto giorni prima del/ possesso di Papa Bras-/ chi il di 12 Nbre 1775. (RB'45)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Vertical rectangle. Two standing eagles support the tails of dolphins, whose mouths are connected by a festoon. Behind and above them rises a bag-like horn, with leaves and a calyx supporting a star with many points. Usual background.
